: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus Prime: What you did to help Nightlight's spark, are you capable of doing the same with yourself? That could help.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Aggressive? This shocked him. Was he really behaving so strangely? 
Maybe he was infected after all...

AzureBlade: What do you suggest then?

As Denzabar entered, he suddenly felt as though he knew him, but he 
said nothing.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> Denzabar finished going through the ship and entered the room with 
Elita and 
> Nightlight. "Oh, SOrry, am I intruding?"
